page.title: 15Silsoe
page.content: Silsoe is situated halfway between Luton and Bedford, made up of some old and many new houses. It has a Parish Church, St.James and a Primary School with 77 children on roll aged from 5-9 yrs.There is a Village Hall which is used for Playgroup, W.I.,Silsoe Drama group and Keep Fit classes. There are two small shops one selling newspapers and offering a delivery service for papers. The George Hotel is also a public house and restaurant. Silsoe has a Agricultural and Horticulture Unit which is part of Bedford College of Higher Education. It also has Silsoe College which is a faculty of the Cranfield Institute of Technology which is a British University. Two honours degree courses are offered. The Bachelor of Engineering & The Bachelor of Science courses.Developing countries is given special help.
